transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, very good afternoon sir.
Customer: Very good afternoon, ji boliye.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Bol raha hu IndiaMART office accounting se.
Customer: Kahan se?
Executive: Dharmendra bol raha hu IndiaMART office se sir.
Customer: Ji boliye sir.
Executive: Aapke account manager Muskan hai na unko aapne call kiya tha but unhone aapka call shayad response nahi kar payi.
Executive: To koi issue aa raha tha kya hamara IndiaMART service ko leke?
Customer: Ha koi call wall nahi aa rahi hai sir koi nahi inquiry itni healthy aa rahi hai pata nahi kya hai bas isi se related baat karni thi madam kab tak aayengi koi nahi aisi koi baat nahi thi bas yahi tha.
Executive: Achcha madam se meri baat ho gayi thi unke yahan koi condolence ho gayi thi na.
Customer: Ha ha madam se baat ho gayi thi aapki.
Customer: Ha meri ho gayi thi baat madam ne mujhe whatsapp kar diya tha keh rahi thi mere grandfather ka condolence ho gaya hai to usme.
Executive: Okay ha wahi reason the.
Customer: Koi na dekho pata nahi I don't know.
Customer: Koi aisi baat nahi hai Dharmendra ji koi aisi baat nahi hai theek hai sir.
Executive: Actually actually incoming.
Executive: Kya sir?
Executive: Actually jab koi call aap karte ho kisi account manager ko agar wo call response nahi karte hai na to ticket open ho jati hai hamare yahan to ek satisfied not service ka mail aaya ha iski vajah se maine aapko connect kiya hai.
Customer: Chale na sir koi nahi main kar dunga.
Executive: Baki wo aati hai to aapse connect kar lete hai theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay okay kab tak aayengi bas ye bata dijiye.
Executive: Sir jaise hi aayengi waise connect kar lenge mujhe idea nahi hai kyunki unke grandfather mein problem.
Customer: Monday Tuesday tak keh rahi thi wo.
Executive: Ha monday tuesday tak aa jayengi baki agar service mein kuch aur help chahiye to bata dijiye main kar deta hu.
Customer: Nahi bas yahi tha sir thoda sa dekh lena kyunki inquiries badi waisi aa rahi hai koi unrelevant aa rahi hai irrelevant ho rahi hai.
Executive: Achcha theek hai main unse update mera profile check karke mujhe kabhi bhi call kar sakte hai bata dena mujhe kya karna hai isme theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai lekin baki sir dekho IndiaMART pe aap 2023 se run kar rahe ho IndiaMART pe 2023 se run kar rahe ho to main baat karu to 2023 se achcha run bhi kafi achcha.
Executive: Manufacturing karte hai ya trading ka kaam karte hai sir?
Customer: Dono hai sir hamara trading bhi hai manufacturing bhi hai.
Executive: Okay sir dekho market mein kya hai na dekho aapke catalog ka score kafi achcha hai 80% Muskan ne kar rakha hai 50 total product hai aur jis product pe call aur inquiry kam aane ka thoda reason agar bagal mein hi hai na kai companyo competition high level ka hai.
Customer: Thoda sa ha ha ha.
Executive: To agar aap kyun nahi apni company ke liye thoda sa competition kam karte hai.
Customer: Achcha karenge karenge sir bilkul karenge.
Executive: Sir sir jyada nahi keh raha hu ek step ek step aage badhiye har saal kyunki 2023 se aap same service use kar rahe ho.
Customer: Chale karte hai karte hai aa jane de madam ko main karta hu theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai sure sir.
Customer: Theek hai Dharmendra ji.
Executive: Okay namaskar sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving enough healthy inquiries.

- Inquiries are irrelevant.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about account manager's absence.

- Executive offered assistance with the service.

- Executive assured to check customer's profile.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Account manager will connect later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiries, account manager, catalog, competition
